Name: Cunning Wish
Text: You may reveal an instant card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.

Name: Yawgmoth's Will
Text: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard.\nIf a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

Name: Ravenous Baloth
Text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

Name: Decree of Justice
Text: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.\nCycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
